name: Brave Bit
blurb: Brave Bit is a Dark Micro Platform Puzzle game. IOS - ANDROID - MAC OS

rewards.reward:
With this pledge you will receive, 
1. A free iOS or Android copy of Brave Bit after release.

(Android copy is subject to achieving Milestone, see project details for more info)
